ROM.Changelog: - October Security Patch Merged - KRACK vulnerability patches Merged - Added toggle to Disable media art on Lockscreen - Added toggle to hide alarm, date and clock on Lockscreen - Added toggle to hide the Auto brightness icon in brightness slider - Updated Magisk to 14.0 - Updated Lawnchair - Updated and Fixed some stuff of OnePlus Camera - Added Auto brightness for ambient display - Added Spectrum app support - Added ColorEngine - Added bootup Boost - Fixed Navbar back button - Removed Inbuilt Dark Theme - Synced with Latest Lightning Kernel - Synced with Latest Lineage
